thread.title_full: Attention Houston Shoppers! Stay at the Westin Galleria for 50% Off

title: Attention Houston Shoppers! Stay at the Westin Galleria for 50% Off
text:
Attention Houston Shoppers! Stay at the Westin Galleria for 50% Off July 25, 2015 
Courtesy: Westin Oaks Houston at the Galleria 
The deal : Stay at the Westin Oaks Houston at the Galleria on Fridays and Saturdays for $129 per night . That’s a discount of 50 percent off weekend rates. 
When you’ll go : Anytime through October (some exceptions apply). 
Why we love it : Why spend on a hotel room when you can stash that money away for shopping? This deal is perfect for a weekend spree at Houston’s Galleria, where you’ll be staying. 
What you can do there : Even if retail therapy isn’t for you, there’s you’ll be staying amid the abundant dining of Houston’s Uptown district. You can venture further out to the city’s museum district, which includes the Children’s Museum of Houston, the Museum of Fine Arts Houston, and the Houston Museum of Natural Science. The hotel itself includes two restaurants and an outdoor swimming pool. 
How long does this deal last? July 31 (subject to availability) 
This deal was provided by Travelzoo Tumblr
